00025 template <class ReadArchive, class WriteArchive>
00026 class TFileSerializerComp:
00027                      public ibase::TLoggerCompWrap<CFileTypeInfoComp>,
00028                      virtual public iser::IFileLoader
00029 {
00030 public:
00031        typedef ibase::TLoggerCompWrap<CFileTypeInfoComp> BaseClass;
00032 
00033        enum MessageId
00034        {
00035               MI_BAD_EXTENSION = 0xac10,
00036               MI_UNSUPPORTED_VERSION
00037        };
00038 
00039        I_BEGIN_COMPONENT(TFileSerializerComp);
00040               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(iser::IFileTypeInfo);
00041               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(iser::IFileLoader);
00042               I_ASSIGN(m_versionInfoCompPtr, "VersionInfo", "Provide information about archive versions", false, "VersionInfo");
00043        I_END_COMPONENT;
00044 
00045        // reimplemented (iser::IFileLoader)
00046        virtual bool IsOperationSupported(
00047                             const istd::IChangeable* dataObjectPtr,
00048                             const istd::CString* filePathPtr = NULL,
00049                             int flags = 0,
00050                             bool beQuiet = true) const;

00052        virtual int SaveToFile(const istd::IChangeable& data, const istd::CString& filePath = istd::CString()) const;

00055        class ReadArchiveEx: public ReadArchive
00056        {
00057        public:
00058               typedef ReadArchive BaseClass;
00059 
00060               ReadArchiveEx(const istd::CString& filePath, const TFileSerializerComp* loggerPtr)
00061               :      ReadArchive(filePath),
00062                      m_loggerPtr(loggerPtr)
00063               {
00064               }
00065 
00066        protected:
00067               // reimplemented (istd::ILogger)
00068               virtual bool IsLogConsumed(
00069                                    const MessageCategory* /*categoryPtr*/,
00070                                    const int* flagsPtr = NULL) const
00071               {
00072                      static const MessageCategory slaveCategory = MC_INFO;
00073 
00074                      return (m_loggerPtr != NULL) && m_loggerPtr->IsLogConsumed(&slaveCategory, flagsPtr);
00075               }
00076               virtual bool SendLogMessage(MessageCategory category, int id, const istd::CString& message, const istd::CString& messageSource, int flags = 0) const
00077               {
00078                      if (m_loggerPtr != NULL){
00079                             istd::CString correctedMessage = message;
00080                             istd::CString correctedMessageSource = messageSource;
00081 
00082                             BaseClass::DecorateMessage(category, id, flags, correctedMessage, correctedMessageSource);
00083 
00084                             return m_loggerPtr->SendLogMessage(MC_INFO, id, correctedMessage, correctedMessageSource, flags);
00085                      }
00086 
00087                      return false;
00088               }
00089 
00090        private:
00091               const TFileSerializerComp* m_loggerPtr;
00092        };
00093

00157 template <class ReadArchive, class WriteArchive>
00158 bool TFileSerializerComp<ReadArchive, WriteArchive>::IsOperationSupported(
00159                      const istd::IChangeable* dataObjectPtr,
00160                      const istd::CString* filePathPtr,
00161                      int flags,
00162                      bool beQuiet) const
00163 {
00164        if ((dataObjectPtr != NULL) && (dynamic_cast<const iser::ISerializable*>(dataObjectPtr) == NULL)){
00165               if (!beQuiet){
00166                      SendInfoMessage(MI_BAD_OBJECT_TYPE, "Object is not serializable");
00167               }
00168 
00169               return false;
00170        }
00171 
00172        if ((flags & (QF_DIRECTORY_ONLY | QF_ANONYMOUS_ONLY)) != 0){
00173               return false;
00174        }
00175 
00176        if (filePathPtr != NULL){
00177               if ((flags & QF_NO_SAVING) != 0){
00178                      isys::IFileSystem* fileSystemPtr = istd::GetService<isys::IFileSystem>();
00179                      if (fileSystemPtr != NULL){
00180                             if (!fileSystemPtr->IsPresent(*filePathPtr)){
00181                                    return false;
00182                             }
00183                      }
00184               }
00185 
00186               istd::CStringList fileExtensions;
00187               if (GetFileExtensions(fileExtensions)){
00188                      int extensionsCount = fileExtensions.size();
00189                      for (int i = 0; i < extensionsCount; ++i){
00190                             const istd::CString& extension = fileExtensions[i];
00191                             if (!filePathPtr->IsEmpty() && filePathPtr->substr(filePathPtr->length() - extension.length() - 1) == istd::CString(".") + extension.ToLower()){
00192                                    return true;
00193                             }
00194                      }
00195 
00196                      if (!beQuiet){
00197                             SendInfoMessage(MI_BAD_EXTENSION, "File extension is not supported");
00198                      }
00199 
00200                      return false;
00201               }
00202        }
00203 
00204        return true;
00205 }

00208 template <class ReadArchive, class WriteArchive>
00209 int TFileSerializerComp<ReadArchive, WriteArchive>::LoadFromFile(istd::IChangeable& data, const istd::CString& filePath) const
00210 {
00211        if (IsOperationSupported(&data, &filePath, QF_NO_SAVING, false)){
00212               ReadArchiveEx archive(filePath, this);
00213 
00214               I_ASSERT(!archive.IsStoring());
00215 
00216               iser::ISerializable* serializablePtr = dynamic_cast<iser::ISerializable*>(&data);
00217               I_ASSERT(serializablePtr != NULL);
00218 
00219               istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(NULL, istd::IChangeable::CF_MODEL);
00220 
00221               if (serializablePtr->Serialize(archive)){
00222                      changePtr.SetPtr(&data);
00223 
00224                      return StateOk;
00225               }
00226               else{
00227                      OnReadError(archive, data, filePath);
00228               }
00229        }
00230 
00231        return StateFailed;
00232 }
00233 
00234 
00235 template <class ReadArchive, class WriteArchive>
00236 int TFileSerializerComp<ReadArchive, WriteArchive>::SaveToFile(const istd::IChangeable& data, const istd::CString& filePath) const
00237 {
00238        if (IsOperationSupported(&data, &filePath, QF_NO_LOADING, false)){
00239               WriteArchiveEx archive(filePath, GetVersionInfo(), this);
00240               I_ASSERT(archive.IsStoring());
00241 
00242               const iser::ISerializable* serializablePtr = dynamic_cast<const iser::ISerializable*>(&data);
00243               I_ASSERT(serializablePtr != NULL);
00244 
00245               if (!CheckMinimalVersion(*serializablePtr, archive.GetVersionInfo())){
00246                      SendWarningMessage(MI_UNSUPPORTED_VERSION, "Archive version is not supported, possible lost of data");
00247               }
00248 
00249               if ((const_cast<iser::ISerializable*>(serializablePtr))->Serialize(archive)){
00250                      return StateOk;
00251               }
00252               else{
00253                      SendInfoMessage(MI_CANNOT_SAVE, "Cannot serialize object to file");
00254               }
00255        }
00256 
00257        return StateFailed;
00258 }

00263 template <class ReadArchive, class WriteArchive>
00264 const iser::IVersionInfo* TFileSerializerComp<ReadArchive, WriteArchive>::GetVersionInfo() const
00265 {
00266        return m_versionInfoCompPtr.GetPtr();
00267 }
00268 
00269 
00270 template <class ReadArchive, class WriteArchive>
00271 void TFileSerializerComp<ReadArchive, WriteArchive>::OnReadError(const ReadArchive& /*archive*/, const istd::IChangeable& /*data*/, const istd::CString& filePath) const
00272 {
00273        SendWarningMessage(MI_CANNOT_LOAD, istd::CString("Cannot load object from file ") + filePath);
00274 }

00276 
00277 template <class ReadArchive, class WriteArchive>
00278 bool TFileSerializerComp<ReadArchive, WriteArchive>::CheckMinimalVersion(const iser::ISerializable& object, const iser::IVersionInfo& versionInfo) const
00279 {
00280        iser::IVersionInfo::VersionIds ids = versionInfo.GetVersionIds();
00281 
00282        for (         iser::IVersionInfo::VersionIds::const_iterator iter = ids.begin();
00283                             iter != ids.end();
00284                             ++iter){
00285               int id = *iter;
00286 
00287               I_DWORD minimalVersionInfo = object.GetMinimalVersion(id);
00288 
00289               I_DWORD versionNumber;
00290               if (versionInfo.GetVersionNumber(id, versionNumber)){
00291                      if (versionNumber < minimalVersionInfo){
00292                             return false;
00293                      }
00294               }
00295        }
00296 
00297        return true;
00298 }
